name: part_008
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】紫咲シオン 4th Anniversary LIVE【#紫咲シオン4周年記念】 [WkUXJUQMZ-8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Gawr Gura and Murasaki Shion talk about their first meeting and take photos in various poses.
Murasaki Shion performs the song 'GO! GO! MANIAC'.

subtitles.original: 来てくれてありがとうシオン先輩！
subtitles.english: Thanks for coming, Shion-senpai!

subtitles.original: 1年半前初めて会ってコラボとか歌ってみたとか上げたよね
subtitles.english: We met for the first time 1.5 years ago and did collabs and covers together.

subtitles.original: うわー、時間が早く経ちますよね
subtitles.english: Wow, time really flies, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: 初めての会話、まだ覚えています
subtitles.english: I still remember our first conversation.

subtitles.original: あの会話覚え...
subtitles.english: I remember that conversation...

subtitles.original: ぐら、だめでしょ！
subtitles.english: Gura, no! Don't say that!

subtitles.original: やっと3Dで会えたね。実際に会ってみてどうかな？
subtitles.english: We finally met in 3D. How do you feel meeting in person?

subtitles.original: 印象とかある？
subtitles.english: Any impressions?

subtitles.original: うん、はい
subtitles.english: Um, yes.

subtitles.original: シオン先輩は思ったより背が低いですよね
subtitles.english: Shion-senpai is shorter than I thought.

subtitles.original: ぐらだって小さいでしょ！
subtitles.english: Gura, you're small too!

subtitles.original: 見せて、見せて
subtitles.english: Show me, show me.

subtitles.original: やだ、どうしよう。じゃあ、見せようかな先輩
subtitles.english: Oh no, what should I do? Well, I guess I'll show you, Senpai.

subtitles.original: 見せて、くるっと回ってくるっと
subtitles.english: Show me, spin around, spin around.

subtitles.original: おー、かわいい！
subtitles.english: Oh, cute!

subtitles.original: かわいい！
subtitles.english: So cute!

subtitles.original: かわいいー、しっぽがかわいい
subtitles.english: So cute! The tail is cute!

subtitles.original: おー、かわいい
subtitles.english: Oh, cute.

subtitles.original: ぐら、写真撮ろうよ
subtitles.english: Gura, let's take a photo.

subtitles.original: うん、OKです
subtitles.english: Yeah, okay.

subtitles.original: やったー
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: シオン、ガオ
subtitles.english: Shion, Gao!

subtitles.original: ガオ
subtitles.english: Gao!

subtitles.original: ガオ
subtitles.english: Gao!

subtitles.original: ガオ
subtitles.english: Gao!

subtitles.original: 次はなにする？
subtitles.english: What's next?

subtitles.original: ハート
subtitles.english: Heart.

subtitles.original: ハート、イエーイ
subtitles.english: Heart, yay!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ラストは...
subtitles.english: Well, last is...

subtitles.original: どやー
subtitles.english: Doya!

subtitles.original: どや
subtitles.english: Doya.

subtitles.original: どや
subtitles.english: Doya.

subtitles.original: どや
subtitles.english: Doya.

subtitles.original: GO! GO! MANIAC
subtitles.english: GO! GO! MANIAC

subtitles.original: やばい、止まらない、止まらない
subtitles.english: No way, I can't stop, I can't stop

subtitles.original: 昼に夜に朝に Sing a song
subtitles.english: Morning, night, afternoon, Sing a song

subtitles.original: 好きなことしてるだけだよ GO! GO! MANIAC
subtitles.english: I'm just doing what I love, GO! GO! MANIAC

subtitles.original: あのメロディ、このリリック
subtitles.english: That melody, these lyrics

subtitles.original: 探していきたいんだもっともっと
subtitles.english: I want to keep searching for more and more

subtitles.original: みんな一緒にね Chance! 願いは Jump!
subtitles.english: Everyone together, Chance! Wishes Jump!

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けて Hop! 想いは Step!
subtitles.english: Run through Hop! Feelings Step!

subtitles.original: 伝えよう Music! ハート ここにしてもっかい
subtitles.english: Let's convey Music! Heart, put it here once more

subtitles.original: 誰でも持ってるハートという名の小宇宙
subtitles.english: Everyone has a microcosm called a heart

subtitles.original: 眠っているよ 喜怒哀楽や愛
subtitles.english: Joy, anger, sorrow, pleasure, and love are sleeping there

subtitles.original: 瞬間当たりにワクワクを教えてたり美人
subtitles.english: Teaching excitement in an instant, a beauty

subtitles.original: 感慨満載の日々 歌にしちゃおう ぶちまけちゃおう
subtitles.english: Days full of deep emotion, let's make them into a song, let's pour it all out

subtitles.original: 追求しちゃう無意識に 研究されニュース
subtitles.english: Unconsciously pursuing, being researched as news

subtitles.original: エアでOK 雰囲気重視で 刻むリズム 悔いはない毎日
subtitles.english: It's okay with air, focusing on the atmosphere, carving the rhythm, no regrets in everyday life

subtitles.original: Enjoy 楽しんだもん勝ち
subtitles.english: Enjoy, the one who has fun wins

subtitles.original: ごめん 譲れない 譲らない
subtitles.english: Sorry, I can't give in, I won't give in

subtitles.original: 縦横無尽に Sing a song
subtitles.english: Freely in all directions, Sing a song

subtitles.original: 好きな音でしてるだけだよ GO! GO! MANIAC
subtitles.english: I'm just doing it with sounds I like, GO! GO! MANIAC

subtitles.original: あのグルーヴ、このリバーブ
subtitles.english: That groove, this reverb

subtitles.original: 試していきたいんだずっとずっと
subtitles.english: I want to keep trying it forever and ever

subtitles.original: 息合わせてね Shake! 瞳で Dash!
subtitles.english: Sync our breath, Shake! Dash with your eyes!

subtitles.original: 強気に Shake! 盛り上がろう
subtitles.english: Shake strongly! Let's get excited

subtitles.original: 浴びたら忘れられない 喝采
subtitles.english: Once you bask in it, you'll never forget the applause

subtitles.original: 本当現実は待ったなし 小説より
subtitles.english: Really, reality waits for no one, more than a novel

subtitles.original: 音に暮らしてても ぶつかる出会い
subtitles.english: Even if I live in sound, I encounter clashes

subtitles.original: 急転当たりにグッときたりシンパシー
subtitles.english: Getting moved by sudden turns, sympathy

subtitles.original: 何これって運命じゃ 溺れちゃおう 目一杯楽しんじゃおう
subtitles.english: Is this fate? Let's drown in it, let's have as much fun as we can

subtitles.original: 次元超えても通常通り 引き下げない Friendship
subtitles.english: Even crossing dimensions, normal as always, won't lower my friendship

subtitles.original: 約束してないのに つい集まる ホットなメンバー
subtitles.english: Even though we didn't promise, we always gather, the hot members

subtitles.original: 相当抜群 衝突して聞こえるよな ガン
subtitles.english: Quite outstanding, it sounds like we're colliding, Bang!

subtitles.original: 飛べ 笑顔ピカ 笑顔でね
subtitles.english: Fly, sparkling smiles, with a smile

subtitles.original: 晴れも曇りも Ups and downs
subtitles.english: Sunny or cloudy, Ups and downs

subtitles.original: 好きな人といるだけだよ GO! GO! MANIAC
subtitles.english: I'm just with the people I love, GO! GO! MANIAC

subtitles.original: あのハーモニー、このパーティー
subtitles.english: That harmony, this party

subtitles.original: 受け止めていきたいの 即断即決
subtitles.english: I want to accept it, quick decision

subtitles.original: 目合わせてね Chance! 心の View!
subtitles.english: Meet our eyes, Chance! View of the heart!

subtitles.original: 重ねて Blue! 輝くわ
subtitles.english: Layered Blue! It shines

subtitles.original: まだまだいけるはずよ 正真正銘
subtitles.english: We should still be able to go, genuine
